definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: This text introduces a measure system based on Single chip which can monitor displacements of the paper cutter.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于单片机的切纸机位移测量系统。

sentences.english: The paper applies microprocessor technology, designs the controller of return irrigation system of geothermal water.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用单片机技术，设计实现地热水回灌控制器。

sentences.english: An MCU-based fuzzy control technique for fiber drawing machines is developed.
sentences.chinese: 文章提出一种基于单片机的光纤拉丝机模糊控制方法。

sentences.english: Fully digital line switching and MCU controlled service reset timing.
sentences.chinese: 全数字化线路开关和单片机控制服务复位时间。

sentences.english: Double piece single-chip computers were kept in touch with each other by the mean of wireless communication.
sentences.chinese: 两片单片机采用无线通信的方式进行通信。

sentences.english: Touches controls the screen, Digital demonstration, Monolithic integrated circuit control.
sentences.chinese: 触控屏，数字显示，单片机控制。

sentences.english: The program of the microcontroller is written in C96 language.
sentences.chinese: 单片机程序采用C96语言编制。

sentences.english: Only by the single-chip CPU chip developed from the dedicated processor.
sentences.chinese: 单片机由芯片内仅有CPU的专用处理器发展而来。

sentences.english: A new gravity-flow meter under controlling of a single chip computer is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了单片机控制下的一种新型重量式流量计。

sentences.english: The hardware platform of low-power consumption is designed with the low-power consumption MCU (Microprogrammed Control Unit) as the hardware core.
sentences.chinese: 以微功耗单片机为硬件核心，设计了低功耗硬件平台。

sentences.english: Use the technology of single-chip, this article finishes the design of systematic which tests the rotational speed of the granulator.
sentences.chinese: 运用单片机技术，完成了制粒机转速测试系统的设计。

sentences.english: In this paper, SCM to achieve the temperature control.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用单片机来实现对温度的控制。

sentences.english: This text introduction makes use of method and its applications that a singlechip design recovers from illness the instrument.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍利用单片机设计康复仪的方法和它的应用。

sentences.english: The design of external counterpulsation system based on singlechip is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于单片机的体外反搏系统的设计。

sentences.english: An overload relay which based on PIC single-chip microcomputer was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了基于PIC单片机的过载继电器。
